オプション1:
Before heading to the ruins, he went to the cache where he'd hidden
weapons and tools; they were still there just as he'd left them.

The newly remade weapons and tools performed better,
but they broke quickly in use, so the old ones would still be useful
if he brought them back.
Star Man looked at Precision from a distance.

The raft had been destroyed.
He couldn't tell whether a monster did it or if rain and wind broke it naturally.
But he couldn't shake the feeling that that man had smashed it.
Star Man entered Precision, warily and with hesitation.

The inside of Precision had been ransacked.
It looked like that man had gone on a rampage.
Afraid to linger here, Star Man decided to head back at once.
